msg: Update the examples for a second smtp port

author: hwright
msg: Update the nightly build script to use release.py to build the release
Don't export construct-rolling-environment.sh, but use release.py instead.

author: elecharny
msg: o Added a test to check that we can't add an entry under an Alias

author: julianfoad
msg: Simplify the semantics of svn_fspath__skip_ancestor() to return NULL if the
supposed child is not in fact a child.
(svn_fspath__skip_ancestor): Return NULL if 'child' is not a child.
eliminating the use of 'is_ancestor()' to test the result.
